MainProduct.html:
Bevel

Bevel Essential Disposable Starter Kit

Sale price$29.95 Regular price$0.00(/)

*20% OFF APPLIED AT CHECKOUT



The Bevel Essential Disposable Safety Razor Starter kit is a simple and convenient shave system designed to help prevent nicks, tugs, and bumps. Our disposable razor, made with 45% wheat straw plastic alternative, is preloaded with our stainless steel Bevel double edge blades and is ready to go out of the pack. This kit includes our non-foaming Clear Shave Gel that provides lubrication and glide and our Bump Control After Shave for a smooth skin finish.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

FOR BEST USE

DISPOSABLE SAFETY RAZOR
After applying Bevel Clear Shave Gel or Bevel Shave Cream, hold the head of the razor against your skin at about a 30° angle. Tilt the handle until the blade just touches your skin. Apply gentle pressure to maintain contact with your skin to prevent tugging and pulling as you shave. Keep your glides short and don’t forget to always shave in the direction your hair is growing. When the blades start feeling dull, it's time for a fresh Bevel Essential Disposable Razor. Dispose used razor in your trash bin.

CLEAR SHAVE GEL
Squeeze a dime-sized amount of Shave Gel onto your fingers. Apply in a circular motion to cover areas you plan to shave, using more product as needed. Shave with the grain in slow, short glides. Rinse with cold water, pat dry and apply Bevel Bump Control After Shave.

BUMP CONTROL
Use after shaving or any time in between. Massage a small amount over clean face and neck. Allow it to dry. Apply our Moisturizing Face Gel afterwards. Sunburn Alert: This product contains an alpha hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin's sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week afterwards.

CLEAR SHAVE GEL


FULL INGREDIENTS
Water, Glycerin, Polysorbate 20, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance, Menthyl Lactate, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyquaternium-39, Chlorphenesin, Panthenol, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bisabolol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract.


POST SHAVE BUMP CONTROL


FULL INGREDIENTS
Water, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 20, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Dihydromyricetin, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract.
